segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she's standing right there in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's kind of funny how focused she is on that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat and tidy, it's a stark contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking those cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he's about to lose his balance any second now, and that could be really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but the woman seems completely unaware of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
